title: Eritrean National Football Federation
text:
The Eritrean National Football Federation (E.N.F.F.) () is the governing body of <a href="Association%20football">football</a> in <a href="Eritrea">Eritrea</a>.
History.
The ENFF was founded in 1996 and affiliated to <a href="FIFA">FIFA</a> and the <a href="Confederation%20of%20African%20Football">Confederation of African Football</a> (CAF) in 1998.
It organizes the <a href="Eritrean%20Premier%20League">Eritrean Premier League</a> and the <a href="Eritrea%20national%20football%20team">Eritrea national football team</a>.
